original_solution_mapping.L1: Thomas made 14 + 7 = <<14+7=21>>21 colored pencil and blending marker drawings.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Thomas made 25 total drawings - 21 colored pencil and blending marker drawings = <<25-21=4>>4 charcoal drawings.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5633.
    Returns: the number of charcoal drawings.
    """
    # L1
    colored_pencil_drawings = 14 # 14 of the drawings were made using colored pencils
    blending_marker_drawings = 7 # 7 of the drawings were made using blending markers
    non_charcoal_drawings = colored_pencil_drawings + blending_marker_drawings

    # L2
    total_drawings = 25 # 25 drawings to display
    charcoal_drawings = total_drawings - non_charcoal_drawings

    # FA
    answer = charcoal_drawings
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Thomas made {colored_pencil_drawings} + {blending_marker_drawings} = <<{colored_pencil_drawings}+{blending_marker_drawings}={non_charcoal_drawings}>>{non_charcoal_drawings} colored pencil and blending marker drawings.

Thomas made {total_drawings} total drawings - {non_charcoal_drawings} colored pencil and blending marker drawings = <<{total_drawings}-{non_charcoal_drawings}={charcoal_drawings}>>{charcoal_drawings} charcoal drawings.
